scripts.setup: npm run install-deps && npm install && npm run generate-config && npm run package:release && npm run update-eol
scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs src && printf "[1;36mView Generated Documentation with [1;32mnpm run view-docs[0m"
scripts.install-npm: cd dist && rm -rf node_modules && shx ln -s ../node_modules node_modules && cd ..
scripts.install-deps: ((ls /QOpenSys && yum group install "Development Tools" -y && yum install git make-gnu unzip nodejs14 unixODBC unixODBC-devel -y) || echo "Installing without Yum") && (which pm2 || (npm install -g pm2 && ln -s /QOpenSys/pkgs/lib/nodejs14/bin/pm2 /QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/pm2) || echo "PM2 already set up")
scripts.reset-git: ((rm -rf .git && git init && git add . && git commit -am "chore(Setup): Clone Eradani TypeScript Template App v2.1.0") || echo "No remote git repo connected") && echo "===== Disconnected from template GitHub Repo. You should connect to your own with [git remote add origin <url>] ====="
scripts.link-keys: (ln -s /QOpenSys/opt/eradani/.npmrc .npmrc) || echo "Product Key Link Failed. Consult terminal output for details."
scripts.create-user: (system "CRTUSRPRF USRPRF(ECNCT) INLPGM(*NONE) INLMNU(*SIGNOFF) TEXT('Eradani Connect user profile') JOBD(QGPL/QDFTJOBD) MSGQ(QUSRSYS/ECNCT) PWDEXPITV(*NOMAX)") || echo "ECNCT User Creation Failed"
scripts.create-objects: ((system "CRTLIB LIB(ECNCTSBS) TEXT('Eradani Connect Subsystem library')" || echo "Subsystem Library Creation Failed") && system "CRTCLS CLS(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) TEXT('Class for Eradani Connect subsystem')" && system "CRTJOBQ JOBQ(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) TEXT('Job queue for Eradani Connect jobs')" && system "CRTJOBD JOBD(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) JOBQ(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) TEXT('Eradani Connect job description') USER(ECNCT) PRTTXT('Eradani Connect jobs') RQSDTA('call PGM(QP2SHELL) PARM(''/QOpenSys/opt/eradani/eradani-connect-template/start.sh'')')" && system "CRTSBSD SBSD(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) POOLS((1 *BASE)) MAXJOBS(30) TEXT('Eradani Connect subsystem description')" && system "ADDJOBQE SBSD(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) JOBQ(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) MAXACT(15)" && system "ADDRTGE SBSD(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) SEQNBR(9999) CMPVAL(*ANY) PGM(QSYS/QCMD) CLS(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN)" && system "ADDAJE SBSD(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN) JOB(ECNCTIN) JOBD(ECNCTSBS/ECNCTIN)") || echo "QSYS Object Creation Failed. Consult terminal output for details."
scripts.update-eol: mv start.sh start.sh.orig && tr -d '' < start.sh.orig > start.sh
scripts.set-permissions: (chmod a+x start.sh) && (system "CHGOBJOWN OBJ(ECNCTSBS) OBJTYPE(*LIB) NEWOWN(ECNCT)" && system "CHGOWN OBJ('/QSYS.lib/ECNCTSBS.lib/*') NEWOWN(ECNCT)" && system "CHGOBJOWN OBJ(ECNCTAPP) OBJTYPE(*LIB) NEWOWN(ECNCT)" && system "CHGOWN OBJ('/QSYS.lib/ECNCTAPP.lib/*') NEWOWN(ECNCT)" && system "CHGOWN OBJ('/QOpenSys/opt/eradani/eradani-connect-template/') NEWOWN(ECNCT) SUBTREE(*ALL)") || echo "Object Authority Change Failed. Consult terminal output for details."
scripts.package:dev: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build:dev && npm run copy:dev && npm run config && npm run install-npm && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.package:fresh: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build:dev && npm run copy:dev && npm run config && npm run install-npm && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.package:release: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run build:release && npm run build-native && npm run copy:release && npm run config && npm run install-npm && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.build-native: (export LIB=ECNCTAPP && cd native && gmake init && gmake clean && gmake && cd ..) || echo "IBM i Asset Build Failed"
scripts.copy:dev: (shx mkdir dist/logs || shx echo Logs directory already exists) && shx cp -r tests native LICENSE README.md package.json dist
scripts.copy:release: shx mkdir dist/logs && shx cp -r tests native LICENSE README.md package.json dist
